text: @thedailybeast @votevets @realDonaldTrump Has lost his mind. Seniors are the most vulnerable. He and @FLOTUS are really wrong. They just don’t get it. They don’t take this Coronavirus seriously and it’s so very apparent in what they do and what trump says. Why do they not do the rules to fight COVID-19?!
